channel.title: I have a problem with port
channel.description:
Hello all. I am new and I want to have my own server, but I can't. I portforwarded, and did all things like this. Then I sent it to my friend and he couln't connect. So I tried to find the problem and I finally got it. I went on canyouseeme.org and it says :
Error: I could not see your service on **.**.**.*** on port (43594) Reason: Connection timed out
or
Error: I could not see your service on **.**.**.*** on port (43594) Reason: Connection refused
So plz help me! :(

item.title: I have a problem with port
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“str8golden, post:2, topic:339458”]firewalls blocking ports ik that but im having the same issue with people connecting 2 my server -.-’’ also that bnogus 100 error in my compiler recoded it 100x idk whats wrong T_T’[/quote]That’s not a fucking answer, stop spamming. God damn I hate it when people do that.

IT CANNOT FIND THE IP ADDRESS TO THAT PORT, SO THEORETICALLY SPEAKING, WHEN YOU PORT FOWARDED YOU TYPED IN THE WRONG ADDRESS FOR THAT PORT TO FOWARD TO.

Edit:

Sorry about caps, didn’t notice…and I didn’t want to rewrite it.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem with port

item.title: I have a problem with port
item.dc:creator: @jesteampro jesteampro
item.description:
@jesteampro wrote:

Hello all.
I am new and I want to have my own server, but I can’t.
I portforwarded, and did all things like this.
Then I sent it to my friend and he couln’t connect.
So I tried to find the problem and I finally got it.
I went on canyouseeme.org and it says :

Error: I could not see your service on ...* on port (43594)
Reason: Connection timed out

or

Error: I could not see your service on ...* on port (43594)
Reason: Connection refused

So plz help me!

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem with port
